articles.content: Most of the crowd of 15,533 at Gainbridge Fieldhouse on Saturday night for the Class 4A state basketball finals had cleared out. Ben Davis top-ranked team, about 30 minutes earlier, had finished off … [+5067 chars]

articles.title: Lou Lopez Senechal and Dorka Juhasz display their emotions after Sweet 16 loss | UConn Post Game - SNY
articles.description: In this UConn post game news conference, graduating fifth-year seniors Dorka Juhasz and Lou Lopez Senchal were overcome with emotion following the Huskies lo...
